__comments: user: (optional) The default, implicit username for the remote hosts. Use this if all usernames will be the same. Otherwise, specify the username as part of the hostname using the format username@HOSTNAME
passwords: You will be prompted for passwords interactively. Do not enter them here
key_filename: (optional) A list of SSH keys to access the remote hosts
hosts: REQUIRED A list of remote hosts. Can be in the format of simple hostnames or as username@hostname where you specify an explicit username to override the default username
